guides.name: Leslie Morgan
guides.biography: Leslie has had a passion for rafting rivers throught the US her whole life. Raised navigating the Salmon by her father, who was a guide, it was natural for her to follow suit.

guides.name: Drew Michaels
guides.biography: Drew attended a river rafting team building event for work. He enjoyed it so much he decided to become a professional guide.

guides.name: Kylee Black
guides.biography: Worked as a shift manager at Starbucks for many years. Decided to take a break from coffee demands and focus on her passion - kayaking.

guides.name: Chance Stephenson
guides.biography: Graduated from UC Berkeley with a degree in Sequential Art. Found river rafting more enjoyable, and actually pays.

guides.name: Liza Thomas
guides.biography: Born and raised in Idaho, appreciates nature so and has navigated the Salmon her whole life.

guides.name: Tyler Dempsey
guides.biography: Was a stock broker in Chicago, then realized his passion was people and the outdoors.
